actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of October 1, 1979 (H. Doc. 96-198) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, budget authority contained in the message of the President of October 1, 1979, (H. Doc. 96- 198) for the special foreign currency program for special international exhibitions of the United States Information Agency.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of October 1, 1979 (H. Doc. 96-198) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
